result.execSummary:
The defendant Stephen B Hoppe was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Stephen B Hoppe is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Stephen B Hoppe was found guilty of Resisting an Officer, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 946.41(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: PAY DIRECT TO CLERK OF COURT, ANY BOND APPLIES - $843. bond applies leaving balance of $114 due by 2-14-15

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant, Stephen B Hoppe (by phone) with Attorney Alex Andrea appeared.  Prosecuting attorney Andrew John Maki.  Kim Silvius - Clerk
(10:41)
Andrea - deft is in Alabama - have agreement to drop felony - plea to misd - $957 - deft should of paid that up front - 1 yr prob
Deft - indicates he sent $957 to his mother to pay this up front  (case only shows $843 paid)

State - plea to Ct 3 - dismiss balance - w/held sent 1 yr prob, assess - $957

Deft - Ct 3 pleads guilty - waives rights & JT & appearance in court - deft is tentatively living in motor home

COURT:  Ct 3 plea voluntary - finds deft guilty
w/held sentence 1 yr probation
$957 (according to deft the full amount was sent to his mother to pay before the plea hearing) **$843 applies** (includes DNA surcharge)
  CONDITIONS OF PROBATION:
assessment

DISMISS:  Ct 1 & 2  - ***ADDRESS UPDATED***

ADDRESS INFO for Stephen B Hoppe
Current: 6291 Spanish Trail Ln, Theodore, AL 36584 United States  (Effective: 01-12-2015)
Prior: E5497 730th Avenue #25, Menomonie, WI 54751

Attorney Alex Andrea appeared without the defendant.  Prosecuting attorney Andrew John Maki.  Kim Silvius - Clerk
(10:33)
Andrea - had an agreement to $957 fine including costs -  may have deft's phone in car 
Break taken
Court attempted to call to deft - no answer - left message

COURT:  grants continuance
  Plea hearing scheduled for January 12, 2015 at 10:45 am.

Defendant, Stephen B Hoppe (by phone) with Attorney Alex Andrea appeared.  Prosecuting attorney Andrew Maki.  Kim Silvius - Clerk
(2:16)
Andrea - deft moved to Mobile, AL, letter went out to deft but failed to mention he would need to do 10 days jail

COURT:  set 3 - 4 months out for plea on Friday
bond continues
  Plea hearing scheduled for December 19, 2014 at 10:30 am.
